Question
========
What is the SI unit of linear momentum?

Answerlist
----------
* \unit{\kg.\m \per \s}
* \unit{\kg.\m \per \s^2}
* \unit{\N.\s}
* \unit{\N.\m}
* \unit{\J.\s}

Solution
========
The kilogram metre per second (\unit{\kg.\m \per \s}) is the SI unit of momentum.
